<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtooffsettable">StringToOffsetTable</a> - This class uniques a bunch of nul-terminated strings and keeps track of their offset in a massive contiguous string allocation. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtooffsettable/#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit a string table definition with the provided name and indent.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When possible, this uses string-literal concatenation to emit the string</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contents in a readable and searchable way. However, for (very) large string</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tables MSVC cannot reliably use string literals and so there we use a large</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// character array. We still use a line oriented emission and add comments to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// provide searchability even in this case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The string table, and its input string contents, are always emitted as both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;static&#96; and &#96;constexpr&#96;. Both &#96;Name&#96; and (&#96;Name&#96; + &quot;Storage&quot;) must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// valid identifiers to declare.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// circumstances. When the string table is longer, emit it as an array of</span></CodeLine>
